definition[0]: a method of sending information stored on a computer, usually across the Internet. Long messages are broken into pieces and put together again when they are received.
definition[1]: a way of sending a large amount of DATA (=information stored on a computer) between computers by dividing it into small pieces which are each sent separately and put together again when they are received
